Barbados: British government establishes a permanent land force in the eastern Caribbean, based in Barbados.
Belgium:
Former Austrian Netherlands and Prince-Bishopric of Liège unilaterally annexed to the French First Republic.
Decree of 14 Brumaire, Year IV brings into force in Belgium the French laws of 1791 abolishing craft guilds.
France: The Directory seized power over the Convention.
Haiti:
Toussaint captured the city of Dondon a second time, this time for France.
The Treaty of Bâle was ratified, ending Spain's involvement in the conflict and surrendering the eastern part of Hispaniola to France.
India:
Maratha Empire defeats the Nizam of Hyderabad in the Battle of Kharda, Nizam ceded territory.
Death of Ahilyabai Holkar
Indinesia: The Batavian Republic, a client state of the French First Republic, and successor state to the Republic of the Seven United Netherlands was proclaimed.
Poland:
Third Partition of Poland
Abdication of Stanisław August Poniatowski
Russia: Battle of Krtsanisi: The Persian army demolished the armed forces of Kartl-Kakheti. The third partition of Poland divided up the remainder of its territory.
